overview: Chasey just loves old movies. The problem is, just when you get to the real juicy parts, you get the old "fade to black". And that's rather unsatisfying to someone with a sex drive as supercharged as Chasey's. Well, that's where her wicked little imagination comes in. You see, all she has to do is close her eyes and the fun really begins! Imagine seeing all those great old films the way they ought to be...as only Chasey could imagine them. So, give Film Buff a review, and oh, yeah, Siskel & Ebert...eat your hearts out.
title: Film Buff
